title: Sky's Adventure [game trailer]
creator_credit: Willow McFadzean, Parker Arnel and Hurstbridge Primary School
brief_description: ‘Sky’s Adventure’ is about a girl Sky and a mean girl Britney. Britney was never nice to anyone but she has to reflect on that when Sky says something to her. Will Britney change after reflecting on what she’s done or keep doing it?
creator_credit_for_label: Willow McFadzean, Parker Arnel and Hurstbridge Primary School
